localChanges: Refactor notifications and add ability to handle other `MandatoryAction`s (`CityBuild` and `ChooseResearch`) which notify in a similar way to Civ 5.
Break `Map` into layers (`Terrain`, `Cities`, etc.) and allow use of a `Portal` to view layered maps through.
`City` view is next on the list.

log: Add missing fields to be exported via `DataObject#toPlainObject`.
Convert `World` from a `Registry` to a `DataObject` to allow `height` and `width` to be passed to the `Client`.
